catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 414
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: mounted fan painting: male ogre figure in blue and back, laying on side and propping head up on PR hand; folded umbrella behind figure
medium: Ink and light colors on mica paper (folding fan mounted on a hanging scroll)
provenance: Gift from Setsu Iwao, November 1975, to Mary Burke
title: Devil's Invocation
